meanings.definition: A style of music characterized by a strong rhythm and a syncopated beat.
meanings.sent1: The swingbeat of the music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to the upbeat swingbeat of jazz music.
meanings.sent3: The swingbeat of the song was so catchy that it got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The swingbeat of the drums echoed through the concert hall, filling the air with energy.
meanings.sent5: The swingbeat of the guitar added a lively touch to the band's performance.

meanings.definition: To move back and forth or from side to side in a smooth, curving motion.
meanings.sent1: She likes to swingbeat on the hammock in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The branches of the tree swingbeat gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The dancer decided to swingbeat across the stage in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The pendulum continued to swingbeat back and forth with perfect rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The boat started to swingbeat as the waves rocked it gently on the water.
